title: Pixel 3 Keeps Reboot When Reaches "G" Logo, It Even Reboots In Safe Mode
content: As the title suggests, I tried looking up troubleshoot, and found safe mode or reset is the best option. However, once I get into safe mode and try to select a different option with my volume up/down button the phone restarts again. This makes safe mode self troubleshoot or resets a non-option.
